ComicInfo.Title: Warbound Part II
ComicInfo.Summary: Warbound Part II: Amadeus Cho takes his group to Atlantis to try and gain the support of Namor. Although Namor refuses Namora joins the group. They arrive in New York just in time to find the Hulk already fighting Iron Man. Cho's group steps in to save some New Yorkers who have stayed behind or come back to watch Hulk destroy! Amadeus attempts to speak to Hulk but is attacked for his troubles. Hercules steps in and quells Hulk's anger telling him that they are supporting his cause.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:59:00. [Issue ID 354797]
